name: vehicle-fleet-management
description: A comprehensive full-stack application for managing vehicle fleet data, equipment lifecycle tracking, and generating detailed analytics reports.

scripts.backend: cd backend && echo 'Starting Flask backend...' && python app.py
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && echo 'Starting React frontend...' && npm run dev
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test-backend: cd backend && python -c 'import sys; print(f"Python: {sys.version}"); import flask; print(f"Flask: {flask.__version__}"); print("Backend dependencies OK!")'
